name: Sproinger
description:
Made for GMTK Jam 2020.

A platformer where the platforms are "out of control" in that they rotate when you land on them. Your character is a springy robot, so you can't move left or right, only jump.

Controls: Space to jump, R to reset early

Music: "Eye of the Storm" by Joth on opengameart.org (CC0)

Ambient wind from here, by Écrivain on opengameart.org (CC0)

Sounds generated in BFXR

All other assets by me, @Thoof4 on Twitter
